entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming north 30 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
